com.theif519.sakoverlay.Async

Class MediaThumbnailGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.theif519.sakoverlay.Async.MediaThumbnailGenerator

  • public abstract class MediaThumbnailGenerator
extends <any>
    Created by theif519 on 11/19/2015.

    An AsyncTask used to retrieve thumbnails and information about the previous ScreenRecorder's recordings.

      • prettyFileSize

        private java.lang.String prettyFileSize(long bytes)
        Converts size to human readable format. Could not have done it this elegantly myself, hence here is the obligatory StackOverflow source: http://stackoverflow.com/a/3758880/4111188
        Parameters:
        bytes - Size
        Returns:
        Human-Readable String representation.

      • doInBackground

        protected java.util.List<VideoInfo> doInBackground(java.io.File... params)
        For each file, it will parse information and store it in a VideoInfo file, which can be used later to add to the VideoInfoAdapter
        Parameters:
        params - Files to parse.
        Returns:
        List of VideoInfo, or null on error.
